price: 90. En als hij (de stervende) tot degenen van de rechterzijde behoort.
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
